org.linq4android.collections

Class Queries

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linq4android.collections.Queries

  • public final class Queries
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides convenient static methods for creating a Linq.
    Author:
    ziaagikian

      • flatternAncestors

        public static <T> LinqQuery<T> flatternAncestors(T child,
                                 Selector<T,T> selector)
        Recursive searches specified object's ancestor by specified parent selector.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        child - the object to search
        selector - selector for getting specified child's parent
        Returns:
        An Query<T> contains specified object and it's ancestors

      • flatternChildren

        public static <T> LinqQuery<T> flatternChildren(T ancestor,
                                Selector<T,java.lang.Iterable<T>> selector)
        Recursive searches specified object's children by specified child selector.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        ancestor - the object to search
        selector - selector for getting specified object's children
        Returns:
        An Query<T> contains specified object and all children
